results.description:
Signet Passive: Improves precision.
Signet Active: Gain adrenaline and improve your precision and ferocity.

facts.description: Improved precision.
Improves precision and ferocity.

name: Signet of Fury
Siegel der Wut
Signe de fureur
Sello de furia

results.description: Throw your greatsword at your foe so that it returns to you, crippling foes along the way.

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

name: Bladetrail
Klingenspur
Lancelame
Rastro de hoja

results.description: Strike your foe with both weapons. Gain quickness for each strike that hits.

facts.description: Skills and actions are faster.

name: Dual Strike
Doppelschlag

Golpe doble

results.description: Spin and attack nearby foes. You can move while spinning.

results.description: Repeatedly strike multiple foes. The last strike does extra damage.

results.description: Chain. Slice your foe.

results.description: Rage. Heal yourself, gain adrenaline, and recharge all primal burst skills. Heal for a percentage of your outgoing damage. This skill extends the duration of berserk mode.
name: Blood Reckoning
Blutige Abrechnung
Reconnaissance du sang

results.description: Rage. Summon a rock that blocks attacks, then shatter it to send out rock fragments that inflict bleeding on all foes in front of you. Extends the duration of berserk mode if it hits.

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.
Block incoming attacks.
